column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Food: This may be why I give it 4 stars. Although they had really good food on their brunch menu
column2: we struggled to find options that did not include eggs or gluten. The menu is small
column3: and although they did not have many options on the menu they were able to accommodate. They also have entre and bottomless mismos for 32 dollars which can be a good deal
column4: depending on what entre you get and how many mimosas you get! ;)
